name: The Run for Olympic Rings
description:
Description:

The Run for Olympic Rings is a small platformer puzzle game where the player plays as 5 athletes from all around the world with various abilities in order to find the lost rings.

Credits: 

Clémentine Simon (ClemWonderland): Pixel Art

*First Game Jam Ever

---

Frédéric Lapierre (fredriclap):  Game Design & Sound Design

*First Game Jam Ever

---

Jean-Christophe Deshaies-Lévesque (jcdeshaieslevesque): Game Design & Level Design

*Fourth Game Jam But First One With Such Amazing People
